education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Economics & Finance

Implement DBT and Airflow to automate data warehouse updates, ensuring streamlined data management processes.
Conducted AB tests across marketing initiatives, refining strategies and driving a 12% increase in conversion rates through iterative optimizations.

experience.title: Implementation and Support Engineer

experience.title: Senior Financial Analyst
responsibilities: Create comprehensive financial models, perform benchmarking, and analyze processes to drive strategic decision-making.

Consult with management to influence long-term strategic decisions, offering insights within a broad scope.

experience.title: Risk Analyst
